name: Harto
description: Has an extremely open mind and a free spirit. Loves anything and everything new. A collector of unique and beautiful clothes and a fashion expert. Models for fashion magazines, but also designs her own clothes.

passiveSkill.name: Sky Oracle
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Harto's DMG to Light and Spell class enemies increases by {placeholder}, and her CRIT Rate increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Eye of Horus
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "The gaze from eye of Horus is frightening. Attacks the enemy team and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each enemy that is Light or Spell class, increases damage by {placeholder}."}

specialSkill.name: Gift of God
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Punishes the sinner with a magic circle. Harto attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Deals double damage to enemies of Light and Spell classes.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Divine Power
normalSkill.description: Harto triggers an explosion over a small area. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: The gaze from eye of Horus is frightening. Attacks the enemy team and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each enemy that is Light or Spell class, increases damage by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens5.skill: Harto's DMG to Light and Spell class enemies increases by {placeholder}, and her CRIT Rate increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Punishes the sinner with a magic circle. Harto attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Deals double damage to enemies of Light and Spell classes.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
